title: Oven Roasted Tomatoes
instructions: Cut the tomatoes in half, length-wise, and squeeze out the seeds and remove the membrane from within the tomatoes.  Set them aside until all are similarly done.
In a medium bowl, combine the sugar, oil, salt, and black pepper and mix well.  Add the tomatoes and toss them to get them well coated with the mixture.

Place the tomatoes, cut side down, on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.  Place them in the oven and roast them for 4 hours, or until the tomatoes are very soft and have lost about half of their liquid.
Store them in the refrigerator in a tightly sealed container for up to 4 weeks.
remarks: Use in combination with your “Basic Tomato Sauce” in making pasta dishes.  The recipe for “Basic Tomato Sauce” is in the “Sauces, Stocks, and Dressing” folder.
source: The Babbo Cookbook by Mario Batali, published by Clarkson Potter/Publishers, , © 2002 by Mario Batali.
